DOCNAME: CASE OF GEERINGS v. THE NETHERLANDS
JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Corneliu Bîrsan;David Thór Björgvinsson;Egbert Myjer;Elisabet Fura;Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre
TEXT: CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( PERSON ) made a conditional grant of legal aid in respect of the proceedings before ORG . It is in the following terms :

“ The grant of legal aid is conditional . The [ ORG ] will not make any final grant of legal aid if it appears after the termination of legal asistance that [ the applicant ’s ] financial means are such that they exceed the limits set by and pursuant to [ LAW ( Wet op de rechtsbijstand ) ] or the cost of legal assistance is reimbursed by a third party . ”
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL of LAW , as relevant to the questions remaining before the ORG , provides :
CARDINAL . No legal aid shall be provided if :

PERSON the legal interest at issue is placed before an international body entrusted with jurisdictional tasks by a treaty ( een bij verdrag met rechtspraak belast internationaal college ) or a comparable international body and that body itself provides a claim in respect of legal assistance ( in een aanspraak op vergoeding van rechtsbijstand voorziet ) ; ... ”
